item.title: Kaspa’s Ghostdag and Kohberger’s Ghosting (Crypto & Crime)
item.description:
Welcome to Shill Kill, where I pair a cryptocurrency review with a true crime case. As a Certified DeFi Expert (CDE) and true crime enthusiast, I offer insight into a crypto project while also discussing a killer. Get ready for a unique fusion of finance and mystery! #cryptocurrency #truecrime


This episode's Shill: Kaspa The Kill: Bryan Kohberger


Shill Kill is a feature #spotifypodcast... Feed: https://anchor.fm/s/15a4788c/podcast/rss

item.title: Spotify Is Screwed
item.description: Spotify is the world’s biggest music streamer, but rarely turns a profit and just cut 17 percent of its workforce. Its business model looks increasingly precarious. Thanks for listening to WIRED. Talk to you next time for more stories from WIRED.com and read this story here. Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/whats-new-with-wired
